mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.name, m.url, m.icon FROM menu m ORDER BY ISNULL(m.order_id), m.order_id, m.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (name, url, order_id) VALUES (#{add.name}, #{add.url}, #{add.orderId})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu m SET m.name = #{ud.name}, m.url = #{ud.url}, m.order_id = #{ud.orderId} WHERE m.id = #{ud.id}
